an4.49:1.3: Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso;
an4.49:1.4: dukkhe, bhikkhave, sukhanti sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso;
an4.49:1.5: anattani, bhikkhave, attati sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso;
an4.49:1.6: asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso.
an4.49:1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro sannavipallasa cittavipallasa ditthivipallasa.
an4.49:2.3: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso;
an4.49:2.4: dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso;
an4.49:2.5: anattani, bhikkhave, anattati nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso;
an4.49:2.6: asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso.
an4.49:2.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro nasannavipallasa nacittavipallasa naditthivipallasati.
